## Procedures.getCallers() function

Find all the callers of a named procedure.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getCallers(name: string, workspace: Workspace): Block[];
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of procedure. |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace to find callers in.  Array of caller blocks.  Blockly.Procedures.getCallers |
